game.name: DCS: NS 430 Navigation System for SA342 Gazelle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: The NS 430 for the SA342 Gazelle module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the SA342 Gazelle cockpit (not as a pop-up display).
game.shortDescriptionEn: The NS 430 for the SA342 Gazelle module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the SA342 Gazelle cockpit (not as a pop-up display).
